about.title: About me
about.textDescription1: Hello! My name is Dmytro, I am a Front-end Developer.
about.textDescription2: I like to look for interesting solutions for accomplishing tasks I am facing and, together with my ideas, implement them in the form of websites and user interfaces. In addition, I am constantly developing in this sphere, since perfection knows no limits :)
about.textDescription3: Validity of the code, complete adaptability of the content, the accuracy and readability of the layout or components as well as the use of the most relevant cutting-edge technologies are crucial cornerstones of my work.

experience.title: Work experience
experience.kawalee-1: Developed current and urgent projects/hotfixes according to layouts/tasks and within deadlines;
experience.kawalee-2: Redesigned and optimised multi-functional & multi-language scalable user-facing (100+ visitors per day) functionality available on client's pages;
experience.kawalee-3: Communicated directly with clients on matters concerned with development process, suggested improvements etc.;
experience.kawalee-4: Maintained and systematised legacy projects, improved quality and readability of relevant code;
experience.kawalee-5: Collaborated with other members of R&D department during common projects, partially monitored their's work.
experience.altum-1: Created adaptive and cross-browser pages according to layout;
experience.altum-2: Implemented new features and fixed issues on existing projects.
experience.kls-1: Translated more than 30 ECtHR judgements, Council of Europe experts' conclusions and recommendations, Venice Commission's opinions as well as several laws of Ukraine;
experience.kls-2: Consulted and gave recommendations to translators on usage of different CAT-tools (incl. technical questions and troubleshooting of issues).
